rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective modifying a risk-adjective.
No high-potency verbs or potent metaphors are used.
The segment contains no moderate verb paired with scale/impact information.
The segment does not contain any questions, loaded or otherwise.
The segment mentions preparedness ('strongest AI surveillance program') but does not explicitly link it to public safety.
The segment contains Reassuring language (Q5 Preparedness) but not minimiser + scale contrast.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes preparedness/response capability ("strongest AI surveillance program", "working... to actively look for the disease") without active reassurance.
